body.name: Steamer for Clothes, 2 Modes Steam Iron Garment & Fabric Wrinkle Remover, 30-Second Fast Heat Up, 300ml Detachable Water Tank, 25 Minutes Continuous Steam for Home, Office and Travel
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 15 hrs 30 mins
features: Detachable Large Water Tank (10.14 ounces) ensures 25 minutes of continuous steaming, allowing you to effortlessly straighten numerous clothes and fabrics without the need for frequent tank refills. The auto shut-off feature activates when the water is depleted

Rapid 30-second Heat Up time and the 1200W premium heating element empower the device to generate steam with enhanced power and concentration. This results in a steady and continuous release of steam, effectively eliminating wrinkles for a polished appearance

The steamer offers Adjustable Steam Force with medium and high modes, catering to diverse fabric needs. Tackle both fine and deep wrinkles effortlessly – choose medium steam for delicate fabrics and switch to high mode for universal clothing items

Experience a hassle-free steaming process with the device's leak-free and spit-free operation. It can be used vertically with a hanger or horizontally on an ironing board, featuring a well-balanced design that enhances the handheld steaming experience

The Ceramic Coated Sole-plate, a safer alternative to stainless steel, accommodates all fabric types – silk, cotton, wool, and linen. Effortlessly remove wrinkles from delicate fabrics, eliminate odors, smooth curtains without removal, and refresh upholstery. Additionally, the device can be used to sanitize toys and other items effectively

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Steamed wrinkles from suit very quickly.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Nice and easy portable steamer for clothes.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sturdier Than I Thought - Good Steamer!
reviews.reviewText: Been using this and I gotta say that I like this design of handheld steamers better. They used to have the other older portable steamers that you couldn't lay horizontally and were worse in quality I felt like. This class of steamer is nice and sturdier to use it feels like and can use horizontally. It didn't have any leak yet for me, I know that is often an issue with steamers. I like the ease of use and portability aspect of it. It's not the strongest steamer in the world but it also isn't hundreds of dollar and is a portable nice steamer that gets the job done for up to medium wrinkled clothes, in my personal experience. I would recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars I like it
reviews.reviewText: Water tank could be bigger. It works as intended. Easy to hold.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Handy hand held steamer
reviews.reviewText: I have used this a few times now. It did heat up quickly each time, I'll say 30-ish seconds not by a clock, just me counting. Not leaking. I do have a standard floor model steamer, which I love and use quite often, so I wanted to try this handheld one for curtains, as with a floor model, you can only reach so high and I like to steam my curtains to freshen them up, get rid of dust mites. It's definitely worth having around. Easy to carry wherever, plug it in and you're ready to steam. I did add a short extension cord. I'm very happy with this product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice to have on hand
reviews.reviewText: I mainly need this for use while traveling, but I have started using it more frequently at the house too. Simple to setup, easy to use, would definitely recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I didn't think that I would like this steamer. I was right. I love this steamer!
reviews.reviewText: This review is for the YIKA Steamer for Clothes, 2 Modes Steam Garment, and Fabric Wrinkle Remover.I didn't think that I would like this. I was right. I love this steamer!When I ordered this, I had every intention of gifting it to someone for Christmas. After I read some of the reviews, I decided to try it. After I tested it, I was blown away by how easy it is to use and how well it works!Years ago, I purchased a steamer from one of the shopping shows on TV. It was not easy to use, and it did not remove wrinkles, so I gifted it to someone in a work gift exchange. I'm sure you see a pattern here.I decided to get the steamer out tonight and give it a whirl. The first item was my work slacks, which had been worn once and had some wrinkles from sitting at the desk all day. Normally, I'd get the iron and the ironing board out to freshen them up. The YIKA Steamer is so much easier and faster. The slacks were steamed and ready for work. Next, I tackled a sweater I'd left in the bottom of my tote; it was a wrinkled mess, and frankly, I didn't have much faith that I could get this ready to wear again. With a few swipes of the YIKA Steamer, it was ready for the office. I love this steamer!Highly recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works well in a Pinch
reviews.reviewText: This little steamer gun works great when you don't want to bust out an iron but need to get rid of wrinkles. I use it all the time but it does not work as well as actually ironing your clothes. You could totally travel with this if you needed to.I would recommend this product.
